name: webhook-receiver
description: Register, manage, and inspect incoming webhook endpoints. Store received webhook payloads for later inspection and processing.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: webhook_receiver
toolDefinition.description: Manage webhook endpoints. Register endpoints with optional secret validation, inspect received payloads, list endpoints, and manage stored webhooks.

action.description: register (create endpoint), unregister (remove), list (show all), inspect (view payloads), receive (simulate incoming webhook), clear (clear stored payloads)

secret.description: Shared secret for HMAC-SHA256 signature validation

maxPayloads.description: Max payloads to store per endpoint (default: 100)
